songs.title: Polaroids
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I been feelin’ optimistic
Countin up and count my blessings
Still I wonder where you been
I’m a passivist and narcissistic
Only hear my own opinions
But I miss when you were here

[Pre-Hook]
I held my breath
When you told me that you loved me
These polaroids are all that's left
Of a time that's in the dark

[Hook]
Bring me the light again
Bring me the light again
Kiss me when I’m runnin’ my mouth
Bring me the light again
Bring me the light again
Sing me all of your favorite songs

[Verse 2]
Lost our garden in a hurricane
Let’s plant some flowers in its place
And start fresh from where we stand
Or we can sail for days and not turn back
I’m a castaway ‘til you come back and
Wake me from this nightmare I’m in

[Pre-Hook]
I held my breath
When you told me that you loved me
These polaroids are all that's left
Of a time that's in the dark

[Hook]
Bring me the light again
Bring me the light again
Kiss me when I’m runnin’ my mouth
Bring me the light again
Bring me the light again
Sing me all of your favorite songs
